item.title: 韩国通胀放缓，但外汇波动引发担忧
item.description: 韩国消费者通胀率降至符合央行目标的水平，因燃料成本回落及去年同期高基数效应共同抑制了价格涨幅。【原文：South Korea’s consumer inflation cooled to a pace in line with the central bank’s target, as easing fuel costs and comparison with elevated gains a year earlier helped temper price growth.】

item.title: 美国贸易协议获胜或将引发外国投资者抢购印度股票
item.description: 印度股市有望缩小其相对于亚洲同行的罕见表现差距，此前新德里与华盛顿达成了期待已久的贸易协议，消除了长期压制该国金融资产并引发创纪录外资撤离的关键利空因素。【原文：Indian equities are primed to narrow their rare underperformance versus Asian peers after New Delhi and Washington clinched a long-awaited trade agreement, removing a key overhang that had weighed on the nation’s financial assets and triggered record foreign outflows.】

item.title: 贝莱德旗下全球基础设施部门与EQT联手竞购电力公司AES
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝莱德旗下全球基础设施合伙公司已与EQT集团联手，共同竞购电力公司AES集团。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s Global Infrastructure Partners has teamed up with EQT AB in its bid to acquire power company AES Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI指控马斯克旗下xAI公司在法庭诉讼中销毁证据
item.description: OpenAI指控埃隆·马斯克的人工智能公司xAI存在"系统性且蓄意销毁证据"的行为。此前OpenAI在诉讼中指控ChatGPT开发商试图阻挠新兴市场竞争。【原文：OpenAI accused Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company of “systematic and intentional destruction” of evidence in xAI’s lawsuit accusing the ChatGPT maker of trying to thwart competition in emerging markets.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望攀升，美国数据提振市场情绪：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周二有望上涨，因强劲的美国制造业数据提振市场情绪，支撑股市和比特币价格的同时，也抑制了贵金属的跌势。【原文：Asian stocks were headed for gains Tuesday after solid US factory data helped lift sentiment, supporting shares and Bitcoin while curbing losses in precious metals.】

item.title: 道明银行的巴拉德瓦杰认为，美元将凭借2月份的反弹抹去2026年的跌幅。
item.description: 道明证券货币策略师贾亚蒂·巴拉德瓦杰表示，美元本月可能延续反弹势头，因为当前正值美国经济数据通常表现强劲的时期。【原文：The dollar is likely to extend its rebound this month in what is typically a strong part of the year for US economic data, according to Jayati Bharadwaj, a currency strategist at TD Securities.】

item.title: 纽约房地产狂潮给德国BVK带来压力
item.description:
一家巴伐利亚养老基金曾支持纽约开发商迈克尔·施沃。如今双方关系已趋紧张。

【原文：

A Bavarian pension fund backed New York developer Michael Shvo. Now the relationship is under strain.

】

item.title: Waymo从Alphabet等投资者处筹集160亿美元资金用于业务扩张
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下的自动驾驶部门Waymo以1260亿美元估值完成160亿美元融资，此轮融资彰显了其作为自动驾驶出租车先驱的迅猛发展态势。【原文：Waymo, Alphabet Inc.’s autonomous driving unit, raised $16 billion at a $126 billion valuation, a funding round that reflects its rapid ascent as a robotaxi pioneer.】

item.title: 新加坡私募信贷规模持续增长，澳大利亚IFM公司加入名单
item.description: 新加坡又吸引了一家国际资产管理公司进驻，随着这个城市国家寻求在蓬勃发展的1.7万亿美元私募信贷市场中增强影响力，此类公司的名单正不断延长。【原文：Singapore has attracted another international asset manager to set up shop, adding to a growing list as the city-state seeks to strengthen its presence in the burgeoning $1.7 trillion private credit market.】

item.title: 外国买家以三年最快速度抢购美国信贷
item.description: 摩根大通数据显示，1月份外国投资者购买美国公司债券的月度增速创近三年新高，稳定的收益率和较低的对冲成本提升了美国信贷产品的吸引力。【原文：Foreign investors bought American corporate bonds at the fastest monthly pace in nearly three years in January, as stable yields and lower hedging costs boosted the appeal of US credit, JPMorgan Chase & Co. data show.】

item.title: 全球债券销售额以史上最快速度突破万亿美元大关
item.description: 全球公开发行的债券规模已创纪录地达到1万亿美元，借款方趁着需求激增之际锁定相对低廉的融资成本。【原文：Global publicly syndicated bond issuance has reached $1 trillion in record time as borrowers seize soaring demand to lock in relatively cheap costs.】

item.title: 恩智浦汽车芯片销售增速低于预期
item.description: 芯片制造商恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）报告称，上季度其在汽车市场的增长略低于预期，该公司正致力于实现业务复苏。【原文：Chipmaker NXP Semiconductors NV reported slightly slower growth in the automotive market than anticipated last quarter as the company pursues a comeback.】

item.title: 土耳其总统埃尔多安任命两名新任央行副行长
item.description: 据土耳其政府公报公布的决定，总统雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安任命了两名新副行长进入该国中央银行。【原文：Turkey’s President Recep Tayyip Erdogan appointed two new deputy governors to the central bank, according to a decision published in the Official Gazette.】

item.title: 澳大利亚任命莎拉·考特为澳大利亚证券与投资委员会主席，接替朗戈掌舵
item.description: 莎拉·考特将接替即将离任的乔·隆戈，出任澳大利亚市场监管机构负责人，成为该机构首位女性掌门人。【原文：Sarah Court will become the head of Australia’s markets watchdog and the first woman to take the helm, replacing outgoing chairman Joe Longo.】

item.title: Palantir股价飙升，因销售预期强于预期
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.对2026财年的营收预测远超华尔街预期，这对数据分析公司而言是一剂强心针——此前该公司股价在今年开局阶段表现低迷。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. forecast revenue for fiscal 2026 that significantly exceeded Wall Street expectations, a boost for the data analytics company after its shares have gotten off to a lackluster start so far this year.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下SpaceX与xAI合并，估值达1.25万亿美元
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克的SpaceX公司已收购xAI，这笔交易体现了这位亿万富翁日益高昂的野心——他正致力于在人工智能和太空探索领域占据主导地位。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX has acquired xAI, in a deal that encompasses the billionaire’s increasingly costly ambitions to dominate artificial intelligence and space exploration.】

item.title: GDI主要投资者反对伯奇希尔收购要约，认为报价过低
item.description: 加拿大GDI综合设施服务公司两大股东表示，将拒绝伯奇希尔股权合伙管理公司及该公司高管提出的私有化收购要约。【原文：Two major shareholders in Canada’s GDI Integrated Facility Services Inc. say they’ll reject a take-private bid from Birch Hill Equity Partners Management and the company’s top executive.】

item.title: 老虎环球基金在美洲大陆金字塔大厦开设旧金山办事处
item.description: 老虎环球基金将在标志性的泛美金字塔大厦开设旧金山办事处，此举标志着华尔街对科技中心重燃兴趣。【原文：Tiger Global Management is opening a San Francisco office in the iconic Transamerica Pyramid tower, a sign of Wall Street’s renewed interest in the tech hub.】

item.title: 国土安全部面部扫描应用程序从12亿张图像数据库中提取数据
item.description: 据彭博社查阅的联邦记录显示，美国联邦移民官员正在使用面部识别技术，该技术从美国政府生物识别数据库中提取数据，该数据库包含超过12亿张面部图像。【原文：Federal immigration agents are using facial recognition technology that draws from US government biometric databases containing more than 1.2 billion face images, according to federal records reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 蓝猫猫BDC因市场担忧科技板块风险跌至多年低点
item.description: 商业发展公司股价周一下跌，因市场担忧该类公司普遍涉足软件领域，引发新一轮抛售潮。【原文：Shares of business development companies fell on Monday, as concerns over the group’s widespread exposure to software sparked a renewed sell off.】

item.title: 在崩盘前，石油和天然气钻井商纷纷趁机抬高价格
item.description: 在全球大宗商品价格暴跌前的数日乃至数周内，页岩钻井商在能源价格飙升之际进行了创纪录的套期保值操作。【原文：Shale drillers engaged in record hedging amid soaring energy prices in the days and weeks preceding the worldwide commodities crash.】

item.title: 特朗普需为鲍威尔纷争开辟退路 以加速沃什入主美联储
item.description: 在特朗普总统的新任美联储主席尚未开始推动降息之际，他可能不得不放弃惩罚前任主席的计划。【原文：Before his new Federal Reserve chief can even begin pushing for interest-rate cuts, President Donald Trump may have to give up on punishing the old one.】

item.title: 印度称美国将取消对俄油采购的25%惩罚性关税
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的新德里官员表示，美国已同意取消对印度购买俄罗斯石油征收的25%附加关税。【原文：The US has agreed to remove a 25% additional tariff imposed on India for buying Russian oil, an official in New Delhi familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 多色公司击败竞争对手，成功获得第11章破产保护贷款
item.description: 由私募股权控股的多色公司获法院批准启动2.5亿美元的第11章贷款，击败了竞争对手贷款方提出的替代融资方案。【原文：Private equity owned Multi-Color Corp. won court approval to start tapping a $250 million Chapter 11 loan, defeating an challenge from rival lenders that floated a competing financing.】

item.title: 小麦跌幅创12月以来最大，谷物加入大宗商品暴跌行列
item.description: 小麦价格一度下跌2%，受美元走强影响，周一农产品市场普遍下跌。【原文：Wheat fell as much as 2%, pressured by a firmer US dollar with agriculture commodities tracking a broad decline in Monday markets.】

item.title: 美国劳工统计局表示将推迟发布1月就业报告，因政府停摆
item.description: 由于政府部分停摆，劳工统计局将不会按原定计划于周五发布1月份就业报告。【原文：The Bureau of Labor Statistics will not release the January jobs report on Friday as scheduled due to the partial government shutdown.】

item.title: 摩洛哥暂停10亿美元地中海液化天然气进口枢纽计划
item.description: 摩洛哥暂停了在地中海沿岸建设液化天然气终端的计划，该项目旨在增加进口并减少污染性燃料的使用。【原文：Morocco paused its plan to develop a liquefied natural gas terminal on the Mediterranean coast that aimed to boost imports and curb the use of dirtier fuels.】

item.title: 阿根廷统计局长在通胀改革期间离职
item.description: 阿根廷统计局局长马尔科·拉瓦尼亚于周一辞职，此时该南美国家正推行新的通胀测量方法。【原文：Argentina’s statistics director, Marco Lavagna, stepped down Monday as the South American nation rolls out new methodology to measure inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普将降低对印度关税，莫迪承诺不购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，在印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪同意停止购买俄罗斯原油后，他将把对印度商品加征的25%关税降至18%。【原文：President Donald Trump said he was lowering his extra 25% tariff to Indian goods to 18% after Prime Minister Narendra Modi agreed to stop buying Russian crude.】

item.title: 瑞银最坏情景预测：人工智能将导致私人信贷违约率攀升至13%
item.description: 瑞银集团表示，若人工智能引发企业借款人领域的"激进"颠覆，美国私人信贷违约率可能飙升至13%。【原文：Private credit could see default rates surge to as high as 13% in the US if artificial intelligence triggers an “aggressive” disruption among corporate borrowers, according to UBS Group AG.】
